sources.full: The Talent and Psionics Open Playtest Round 2

spell.name: Adapt
entries: Choose up to four willing creatures you can see within range. For the duration, a target can survive without any food or water and can't gain levels of {@condition exhaustion} from nonsupernatural environmental or weather effects.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Increased Order
entries: When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 or more. You can target one additional creature within range for each increase of 1.

spell.name: Again

time.condition: which you take when you or a creature within 30 feet of you makes an attack roll and misses

entries: You momentarily rewind time, allowing the creature that made the triggering attack another chance. The creature can reroll the attack and must use the new result.

spell.name: Ally of Time
entries: You alter time in a 40-foot cube within range for the duration. When a creature starts their turn within the cube, you can choose one of the following effects:

entries.name: Accelerate
entries: Until the start of the target's next turn, their speed is doubled, they gain a +2 bonus to AC, and they have advantage on Dexterity saving throws. The target gains an additional action this turn which can be used only to take the {@action Attack} (one weapon attack only), Cast a Spell (cantrips only), {@action Dash}, Disengage, {@action Hide}, Manifest a Power (1st-order powers only), or {@action Use an Object} action.

entries.name: Deccelerate
entries: The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, their speed is halved, they take a -2 penalty to AC, they have disadvantage on Dexterity saving throws, and they can't use reactions until the start of their next turn. On this turn, the creature can take only an action or a bonus action, but not both, and regardless of the creature's abilities or magic items, they can't make more than one melee or ranged attack.

spell.name: Amplify
entries: You channel psionic power into the weapon-wielding limbs of a creature you can see within range. The next time the target hits a creature with a weapon attack during the power's duration, the attack deals an extra {@damage 2d8} psychic damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Increased Order
entries: When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 or more. The extra damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each increase of 1.

spell.name: Apparition
entries: You create a sound or an image that only you and one creature within range perceives. If you create a sound, its volume can range from a whisper to a scream. It can be your voice, someone else's voice, a creature's roar, a musical instrument, or any other sound you pick. If you create an image, it must fit within a 5-foot cube and can't move. The image can't create any effect that influences a sense other than sight. The image disappears if the creature touches it.

spell.name: Aura Projection
entries: You manifest an aura of psionic emotions around you, allowing you to influence nearby creatures for the duration. When you manifest this power and at the start of your turn for the duration, you can choose one creature within 30 feet of you at the start of your turn and one of the following effects:

entries.name: Inspired
entries: The target has advantage on attack rolls and saving throws until the start of your next turn.

entries.name: Sorrow
entries: The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or use their action on their turn to do nothing but weep. Creatures that can't be {@condition charmed} automatically succeed on their saving throw against this effect.

entries.name: Terror
entries: The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} of you until the start of your next turn.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Increased Order
entries: When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 or more.
While this power is active, you can choose to target one additional creature within 30 feet of you at the start of your turns for each increase of 1. You must choose the same effect for all targets.

spell.name: Awe
entries: Target one creature you can see within range. You project psionic energy out to the creature and take on one of the following visages in their mind for the duration:

entries.name: Inspiring
entries: The target sees you in your most heroic form. At the start of each of their turns, the target gains temporary hit points equal to your manifestation ability modifier for the duration.

entries.name: Terrifying
entries: The target sees you in a nightmarish form. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} of you for the duration. The {@condition frightened} target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of their turns, ending the effect on themself on a success. A Construct or an Undead is immune to this effect.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Increased Order
entries: When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 or more. You can target one additional creature for each increase of 1. The creatures must be within 30 feet of each other when you target them, and all targets experience the same visage.

spell.name: Beam Gaze
entries: You fire a sickening beam of force from your eyes at a creature you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take {@damage 3d10} force damage and suffer your choice of one of the additional effects for the duration:

items: The target is {@condition poisoned}.
The target's speed is halved, and they can't take reactions.
{@action Attack} rolls against the target are made with advantage.

entries: A creature affected by this power can repeat the saving throw at the end of their turns, ending the additional effect on themself on a success. If a creature succeeds on their initial saving throw against this power, they take only half as much damage and suffer no other effect.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Increased Order
entries: When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 or more. The damage increases by {@dice 2d10} for each increase of 1.

spell.name: Believe
entries: Target one creature you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or gain a new belief until the end of their next turn. This new belief determines how the creature acts on their turn. Choose the belief the target gains from the following options:

entries.name: Chasm
entries: The target believes a yawning chasm opens beneath them, falls {@condition prone}, and can't willingly stand up.

entries.name: Disaster
entries: The target believes the world is ending and takes the {@action Dash} action to flee in a random direction determined by the GM.

entries.name: Enemies
entries: The target believes their allies are their enemies. The target moves toward their closest ally and makes a melee attack against them. If the target can't reach an ally, they do nothing on their turn.

entries.name: Friends
entries: The target believes all creatures are their friends. They take no action on their turn.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Increased Order
entries: When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 or more. You can target one additional creature within range for each increase of 1, and all targets experience the same belief.

spell.name: Bolster Ego

time.condition: which you take when you or a creature within 30 feet of you makes a saving throw

entries: You psionically strengthen the body and mind of the creature making the saving throw, giving them advantage on the save.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Increased Order
entries: When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 or more. You can target one additional creature for each increase of 1. The creatures must be within 30 feet of each other when you target them.

spell.name: Bones of Glass
entries: You attempt to psionically weaken a creature you can see within range. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target is vulnerable to bludgeoning, force, piercing, and slashing damage for the duration. On a successful save, the target takes {@damage 3d10} psychic damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Increased Order
entries: When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 to target an additional creature within range.

spell.name: Brain Overload
entries: You cause a sudden surge of energy in the mind of a creature you can see within range. The target must make a Constitution saving throw, taking {@damage 14d10} psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If this damage reduces a target with a head to 0 hit points, their head explodes, and if the target can't survive without a head, they die.

spell.name: Broadcast
entries: You broadcast a 1-minute-long telepathic message to every creature that can understand a language within a distance of your choosing up to the range. The message can include images of events that you have personally witnessed. A creature that receives the messages, hears your words and sees the images in their mind, though they still maintain their own senses.

You can further refine the parameters for recipients based on creature kind (for example, the message could be sent to only Humanoids or gnolls could be excluded from receiving the message) or creatures of a particular alignment (for example, the message could be sent to only good-aligned creatures or lawful-aligned creatures could be excluded from receiving the message).
Your message can't be sent to a creature on another plane of existence.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Increased Order
entries: When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 to increase the range to 5 miles.

spell.name: Capture Energy

time.condition: which you take when you take acid, cold, fire, force, lightning, or thunder damage

entries: You capture some of the harmful energy meant for you in a telekinetic grip. You take only half the damage, and you can hurl the captured energy at a creature or object within range by making a ranged power attack. If the attack hits, this target takes half of the original triggering damage.

spell.name: Caress of Fire
entries: You touch one creature in range, and they become wreathed in psionic fire that isn't harmful to you or the target. Whenever another creature within 5 feet of the target touches or hits them with a melee attack, that creature takes {@damage 1d4} fire damage.

spell.name: Chariot of Thought
entries: A 10-foot-radius disc made of semi-translucent psionic force springs into existence beneath your feet for the duration. The disc remains centered beneath you, and while it exists you have a flying speed of 60 feet.

When you manifest this power, each creature and object of your choice touching the dic can be carried on the platform as it moves. The disc passes harmlessly through other creatures and objects. The disc can hold up to nine creatures of Medium size or smaller.
When the power ends, you and any creature or object on the disc fall if it is still aloft, unless they can stop the fall.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Increased Order
entries: When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 to increase the disc's radius by 5 feet.
You can also increase the order by 1 or to increase the flying speed by 15 feet.

spell.name: Choke
entries: You attempt to crush an enemy in telekinetic grip. One Large or smaller creature of your choice within range must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a success, the target takes {@damage 1d6} force damage. On a failure, the target is {@condition restrained} for the duration. A creature {@condition restrained} this way takes {@damage 1d6} force damage at the start of each of their turns and can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of their turns, ending the condition on themself on a success. The power ends if the target is ever outside the power's range or if they have total cover from you.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Increased Order
entries: When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 or more. The damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each increase of 1.
You can also increase its order by 2 to target a Huge creature.

spell.name: Clarity
entries: You touch one creature and help them enter a period of intense mental focus. For the duration, the target has advantage on ability checks and attack rolls.

spell.name: Concussive Slam
entries: You rain down an {@condition invisible} force upon a creature you can see within range. The target must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 1d4} force damage and is knocked {@condition prone}.
This power's damage increases by {@dice 1d4} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d4}), 11th level ({@dice 3d4}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d4}).

spell.name: Concussive Wave
entries: You unleash a rising shockwave of telekinetic power. Each creature of your choice within range must succeed on a Strength saving throw or be thrown 90 feet up and 30 feet away from you then fall to the ground, taking {@damage 1d6} bludgeoning damage per 10 feet fallen, and land {@condition prone}.

spell.name: Crucible
entries: Your mind ignites a 50-foot-square area that is 10 feet high centered on a point on the ground within range that you can see on fire. For the duration at the start of each of your turns, you can cause the fire to spread out from the area 5 feet on all sides, spreading over any surface except for nonflammable liquid (no action required). A creature that starts their turn in the fire must make a Dexterity saving throw, taking {@damage 7d10} fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The fire damages objects in the area and ignites flammable objects that aren't being worn or carried.

spell.name: Cure Ailment
entries: You touch a creature and can end one disease or one condition affecting them. The condition can be {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, or {@condition poisoned}.

spell.name: Dagger of the Mind
entries: You psionically lash out with your mind, psychically damaging a creature you can see within range. The target must make an Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes

{@damage 4d10} psychic damage and can only take the {@action Dash}, Disengage, or {@action Dodge} action on their next turn. On a successful save, the target takes only half as much damage and can take their turn normally.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Increased Order
entries: When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 or more. The damage increases by {@dice 2d10} for each increase of 1.

spell.name: Detonate
entries: You attempt to put a growing spark of explosive psionic potential into a creature you can see within range. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target is imbued with the spark for the duration. On a successful save, you can choose to deal {@damage 4d10} fire damage to the target.

As an action, you can detonate the spark within the target. The target takes {@damage 8d10} fire damage and each creature within 20 feet of the target must make a Dexterity saving throw, taking {@damage 8d10} fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Increased Order
entries: When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 to increase the damage of the detonating spark by {@dice 2d10}.

spell.name: Distant Voice
entries: You send a short message of twenty-five words or less to a creature with which you are familiar.

The creature hears the message in their mind, recognizes you as the sender if they know you, and can answer in a like manner immediately. The power enables creatures with Intelligence scores of at least 1 to understand the meaning of your message.
You can send the message across any distance and even to other planes of existence.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Increased Order
entries: When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 or more. Each increase of 1 allows you to add another 25 words to your message.

spell.name: Elsewhere
entries: You target three creatures you can see within range. Each must make an Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, a target is teleported up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see and their speed drops to 0 until the start of your next turn.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Increased Order
entries: When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 or more. You can target one additional creature for each increase of 1.

spell.name: Embrace the Deep
entries: You psionically shape the flesh and organs of up to five willing creatures that you can see within range. For the next 24 hours, the creatures don't need to breathe and gain one of the following adaptations of your choice, which must be applied to all the targets:

items: Fins and Flippers. The target grows fins and flippers that grant them a swimming speed equal to their walking speed.
Hardened Head. The target's head (or a portion of their body if they have no head) grows hard and pointed, which grants them a burrowing speed equal to their walking speed.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Increased Order
entries: When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 or more. You can target one additional creature for each increase of 1.

spell.name: Extinguish
entries: Choose one creature, object, or psionic effect within range. Any power with an order of 3 or lower on the target ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Increased Order
entries: When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 to end the effects of 4th-order or lower powers, by 2 to end the effects of 5th-order or lower powers, or by 3 to end the effect of any power.

spell.name: Fire Form
entries: You encase yourself in psionic flame and gain the following benefits for the duration:

items: You gain a flying speed of 60 feet.
You are immune to cold and fire damage.
Whenever a creature within 5 feet of you touches you or hits you with a melee attack, that creature takes {@damage 1d6} fire damage.
Your power and weapon attacks deal an extra {@damage 1d6} fire damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Increased Order
entries: When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 to increase the duration to 1 hour.

spell.name: Flame's Master
entries: You emit a burst of psionic energy and affect every Medium or smaller source of light that uses fire within range. These sources include campfires, candles, fireplaces, lanterns, oil lamps, torches, and the like, but don't include supernatural sources, such as objects affected by the light spell or a sun blade. When you manifest this power, you can ignite all sources affected by this power or snuff them out.

spell.name: Flay
entries: You shoot a 15-foot cone of pure psionic energy from your eyes. Each creature in the area must make an Intelligence saving throw, taking {@damage 2d6} psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Increased Order
entries: When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 or more. The damage increases by {@dice 2d6} for each increase of 1.
You can also increase the order by 1 or more to increase the power's area of effect. When you do so, you increase the size of the cone by 15 feet for each increase of 1.

spell.name: Fluid Motion
entries: You imbue your body with a burst of psionic energy, giving yourself one of the following benefits for the duration:

items: You can take the {@action Dash} action as a bonus action.
Your jump distance is tripled.

You have advantage on Strength ({@skill Athletics}) and Dexterity ({@skill Acrobatics}) checks made to escape a grapple and on saving throws against being {@condition grappled} or {@condition restrained}.

spell.name: Fold Space
entries: You bend space to create a one-way pathway to a destination you select, which lasts until the end of your next turn. The opening of the pathway is a 10-foot-diameter circle that appears in an unoccupied space within range. Any creature that passes through the opening is transported to the destination.
The destination you choose must be known to you, though you don't have to have visited it and it can be on any plane of existence.

spell.name: Force Orbs
entries: You create three 1-foot-diameter orbs of swirling energy that circle around you for the duration.
Each orb adds a cumulative +1 bonus to your AC.

As a bonus action while this power is active, you can make a ranged power attack to psionically hurl an orb at a creature or object within 60 feet of you. The orb deals {@damage 4d10} force damage on a hit. The orb disappears after being used to make the attack.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Increased Order
entries: When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 to create four orbs.

spell.name: Forget
entries: You reach into the mind of a creature within range and make them forget critical knowledge.
The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or suffer your choice of the following effects for the duration:

entries.name: Psionics
entries: The target can't manifest powers with an order of 4 or lower.

entries.name: Spells
entries: The target can't cast spells of 3rd or higher level.

entries.name: Weapons
entries: The target loses any weapon proficiencies they have.
A creature affected by this power can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of their turns, ending the effect on themself on a success.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Increased Order
entries: When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 or more.
When you do this, you can target one additional creature within range for each increase of 1.
You must choose the same effect for all targets.

spell.name: Fortify

time.condition: which you take when you or a creature you can see within 30 feet takes acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder damage

entries: You create an {@condition invisible} protective barrier that blocks some of the incoming energy for you or a creature of your choice within range. The target has resistance to the triggering damage type until the end of your next turn.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Increased Order
entries: When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1. When you do so, the duration of the power increases to 1 minute.
You can also increase the order by 2 to turn the damage resistance the target gains into damage immunity.

spell.name: Fracture
entries: You create a burst of psionic power from a point within range. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make an Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes {@damage 6d8} psychic damage and is scrambled for 1 minute. While scrambled, a creature's movement speed is halved, they have disadvantage on ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws, and attack rolls against the scrambled creature have advantage. A scrambled creature can repeat this saving throw at the end of each of their turns, ending the effect on themself on a success. A creature that succeeds on the initial saving throw against this power takes only half as much damage and isn't scrambled.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Increased Order
entries: When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 to increase the damage by {@dice 2d8}.

spell.name: Fulcrum
entries: When you manifest the power, and as your action each round for the duration, you can exert your will on one Huge or smaller creature or object that you can see within range, causing the appropriate effect below. You can affect the same target round after round, or choose a new one at any time. If you switch targets, the prior target is no longer affected by the power.

entries.name: Creature
entries: The target must make a Strength saving throw. On a failure, you move the creature up to 30 feet in any direction, including upward but not beyond the range of this power. Until the end of your next turn, the creature is {@condition restrained} in your telekinetic grip. A creature lifted upward is suspended in mid-air.
On subsequent rounds, you can use your action to attempt to maintain your telekinetic grip on the creature. If you do, they must repeat the saving throw.

entries.name: Object
entries: If the object isn't being worn or carried, you automatically move it up to 30 feet in any direction, but not beyond the range of this power.

If the object is worn or carried by a creature, the creature must make a Strength saving throw. On a failure, you pull the object away from that creature and can move it up to 30 feet in any direction but not beyond the range of this power.

As part of moving an object with this power, you can make a ranged power attack with it against one creature in the object's path. If the attack hits, the target takes {@damage 5d10} bludgeoning damage from a Huge object, {@damage 4d10} bludgeoning damage from a Large object, and {@damage 3d10} bludgeoning damage from a Medium or smaller object.

You can exert fine control on objects with your telekinetic grip, such as manipulating a simple tool, opening a door or a container, stowing or retrieving an item from an open container, or pouring the contents from a vial.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Increased Order
entries: When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 or more. You can target an additional creature or object for each increase of 1.
You can also increase the order by 1 or more to increase the range of this power by 60 feet for every increase of 1.

spell.name: Glimpse
entries: Pick one willing creature within range other than yourself. You glimpse their immediate future and offer a word of warning. The next attack roll made against the target before the end of your next turn has disadvantage.

spell.name: Gravitational Collapse
entries: You bring down a crushing force upon a creature you can see within range. The target must make a Dexterity saving throw, taking {@damage 10d6} force damage and falling {@condition prone} for the duration on a failed save, or half as much damage and not falling {@condition prone} on a successful one. A creature knocked {@condition prone} by this power can use an action to make a Strength ({@skill Athletics}) check against your power save DC, standing up on a success.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Increased Order
entries: When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 or more. The damage increases by {@dice 2d6} for each increase of 1.

spell.name: Guise
entries: You project a psionic appearance over your own that transforms your appearance into that of any creature you have seen that is your size, though none of your statistics change. You can also change the appearance of any gear you wear or hold when you manifest this power.

The changes wrought by this power fail to hold up to physical inspection. For example, if you use this power to become a mastiff, any object passing directly over the image of the mastiff will bump into you while it was seemingly in midair, and anyone who pets the mastiff would feel your body.
To discern that you are disguised, a creature can use an action to inspect your appearance and must succeed on an Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) check against your power save DC.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Increased Order
entries: When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 or more to disguise yourself as a creature that is one size category larger or smaller than you for each increase of 1. When you manifest the power this way, you and everything you are wearing and caring change size, but your physical form remains the same beneath your psionic appearance.
Any item dropped by you returned to normal size at once.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Grow
entries: For each size category larger you become, your size doubles in all dimensions, and its weight is multiplied by eight. If there isn't enough room for you to grow appropriately, you attain the maximum possible size in the space available. You have advantage on Strength checks and Strength saving throws. Any weapons that grow with you deal {@damage 1d4} extra damage per size category they grow.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Shrink
entries: For each size category smaller you become, your size is halved in all dimensions and your weight is divided by 8. You have disadvantage on Strength checks and Strength saving throws. Any weapons that shrink with you deal {@damage 1d4} less damage per size category they shrink (minimum 1 damage).

spell.name: Harlequin
entries: You psionically grasp for control of the mind of one Humanoid you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} by you for the duration. While {@condition charmed}, you have a telepathic link with the target as long as you are on the same plane of existence as them. You can use this telepathic link to issue commands to the target (no action required), which they do their best to obey. If the target completes an order and doesn't receive further direction from you, they defend and preserve themself to the best of their ability.

You can use an action to take total and precise control of a {@condition charmed} target. Until the end of your next turn, the target takes only the actions you choose, and doesn't do anything else. During this time, you can also cause the target to use a reaction, but this requires you to use your reaction as well.
Each time the target takes damage, they make a new Wisdom saving throw. If the saving throw succeeds, the {@condition charmed} condition ends.
If the target succeeds on their initial saving throw against this power, you can choose to deal
{@damage 3d10} psychic damage to them.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Increased Order
entries: When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 2 to target creatures other than Humanoids.

spell.name: Heat Shell
entries: A shimmering globe of heat extends out from you in a 10-foot radius and moves with you, remaining centered on you. The barrier lasts for the duration.

When you manifest this power, each creature and object of your choice that you can see within 60 feet of you takes no damage from this power. Whenever another creature touches the barrier for the first time on a turn or starts their turn in the globe, they take {@damage 4d8} fire damage.

The barrier prevents an affected creature from passing or reaching through. An affected creature can cast spells or make attacks with ranged or reach weapons through the barrier. The barrier ignites flammable objects it touches that aren't being worn or carried.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Increased Order
entries: When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 to increase the damage by {@dice 2d8}.

spell.name: Heat Transfer
entries: You attempt to drain the life heat from a creature that isn't a Construct or Undead that you can see in range and give that vitality to another. At the start of each of their turns, the target must make a Constitution saving throw, taking {@damage 4d10} cold damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one. Whenever the target takes cold damage from this power, you can choose another creature that isn't a Construct or Undead that you can see within range. That creature regains a number of hit points equal to half the cold damage dealt to the target.

spell.name: Hidden
entries: You send a ripple of psionic energy through a creature within range. Until the end of your next turn, the target and anything they wear or carry is {@condition invisible} as long as it is on their person.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Increased Order
entries: If an attack hits or misses you, you can manifest this power as a reaction with yourself as the target if you increase its order by 1.
When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 2. When you do this, its duration increases to 1 minute.

spell.name: Icon of Fear
entries: Pick one creature you can see within range. Each creature of your choice within 30 feet of the target sees them as something they fear and must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} of the target for the duration. A creature {@condition frightened} this way can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of their turns, ending the condition on themself on a success.

spell.name: Ignite
entries: A small fire breaks out on a creature you see within range. The target must make a Dexterity saving throw or take {@damage 2d6} fire damage and light on fire for the duration. While on fire, a creature takes {@damage 1d6} fire damage at the end of its turns. An on-fire creature can use an action to repeat the saving throw, putting out the fire on a success. On a failed save, a target takes only half as much damage and doesn't light on fire.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Increased Order
entries: When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 or more. The initial damage increases by {@dice 2d6} for each increase of 1.

spell.name: Illuminator
entries: A focused 30-foot cone of bright light shines from your forehead. The light has sharp edges and gives off no dim light. The light can be colored as you like it.

spell.name: Imbue Flame
entries: You touch a willing creature and imbue them with a spark of fiery psionic force. For the duration, the creature's weapon attacks deal an additional {@damage 1d6} fire damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Increased Order
entries: When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 or more to target one additional creature for each increase of 1.

spell.name: Incinerate
entries: You cause a column of flame, which fills a 5-foot cube, to burst forth from the ground at a point you can see within range and burn until the end of your next turn. Any creature in the column's space when you manifest the power must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take {@damage 1d6} fire damage. A creature must also make the saving throw when they move into the column's space for the first time on a turn or end their turn there. The column ignites flammable objects in its area that aren't being worn or carried.
This power's damage increases by {@dice 1d6} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d6}), 11th level ({@dice 3d6}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d6}).

spell.name: Influence
entries: You can make a Charisma check with advantage to influence one creature within range. If you fail the check, the creature realizes that you attempted to use psionics to influence their mood and becomes hostile toward you. A creature {@condition prone} to violence might attack you. Another creature might seek retribution in other ways (at the GM's discretion), depending on the nature of your interaction with them.

spell.name: Intuition
entries: You target up to three willing creatures within range and gift them precognitive insight to help keep them safe. For the duration, each time a target takes damage, the damage is reduced by {@dice 1d4} (minimum 0).

entriesHigherLevel.name: Increased Order
entries: When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 or more. You can target one additional creature for each increase of 1. The creatures must be within 30 feet of each other when you target them.

spell.name: Invisible Force
entries: When you manifest this power, pick one of the following options:

entries.name: Manipulate Object
entries: You manipulate one object with movable parts in range. For example, you could open or close a door, pull a lever, play a few notes on a harpsichord.

entries.name: Move Object
entries: You can move one object that weighs 5 pounds or less within range up to 30 feet. If the object is more than 30 feet away from you, you lose your psionic hold over it.

entries.name: Object Attack
entries: Pick one object that weighs 5 pounds or less and one creature you can see within range. You hurl the object at the creature, intending to do harm. Make a ranged power attack against the creature. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 1d8} bludgeoning damage. This attack's damage increases by {@dice 1d8} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d8}), 11th level ({@dice 3d8}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d8}).

spell.name: Iron
entries: Your skin turns into a hardened, dark metal, and you gain the following benefits for the duration:

items: You gain 15 temporary hit points. If any of these remain when the power ends, they are lost.
Your AC increases by 2.

You can take the {@action Attack} action to make up to two powerful attacks with your limbs. This is a power attack that deals {@damage 1d10} + your manifestation ability modifier bludgeoning damage on a hit.

spell.name: Jaunt
entries: You bend the space of your environment for just an instance, which allows you or one willing creature within range to teleport to an unoccupied space you can see within 30 feet.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Increased Order
entries: When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1. When you do, the manifestation time for this power becomes 1 bonus action.
You can also increase this power's order by 1 or more to increase the distance you can teleport by 15 feet for each increase of 1.

spell.name: Kindling
entries: You psionically weaken the form of a Medium or smaller creature or object of your choice within range to make them more susceptible to fire. If the target is a creature, they must make a Constitution saving throw. Objects automatically fail.
On a failed save, the target suffers the appropriate effect for the duration:

items: If the target is immune to fire damage, they are resistant to fire damage instead.
If the target is resistant to fire damage, they lose this damage resistance.
If the target has no immunity or resistance to fire damage, they are vulnerable to fire damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Increased Order
entries: When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 or more. You can target one additional creature for each increase of 1. The creatures must be within 30 feet of each other when you target them.
You can also increase the order by 1 or more to target Large creatures or objects with this power, or by 2 to target Huge creatures or objects.

spell.name: Kinetic Crush
entries: You hold a creature you can see within range in a telekinetic grip. The target must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 2d8} force damage and their speed becomes 0 until the start of your next turn. On a successful save, the target takes only half as much damage and their speed isn't reduced.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Increased Order
entries: When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 or more. The damage increases by {@dice 2d8} for each increase of 1.

You can also increase this power's order by 1 or more to move the target if they fail the saving throw against this power. You move the creature 10 feet in a direction of your choice, including up, for each increase of 1.

spell.name: Make Friends
entries: You attempt to psionically charm a humanoid you can see within range. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw, and does so with advantage if you or your companions are fighting it. If they fail the saving throw, they are {@condition charmed} by you until the power ends or until you or your companions do anything harmful to the target. The {@condition charmed} creature regards you as a friendly acquaintance, but this doesn't mean the creature will do whatever is asked of them. When the power ends, the creature knows it was {@condition charmed} by you.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Increased Order
entries: When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 or more.
When you do this, you can target one additional creature for each increase of 1. The creatures must be within 30 feet of each other when you target them.
You can also increase the order by 1 for in order to keep your charm of a secret from the target.
When you do this, a target {@condition charmed} by this power doesn't know they were {@condition charmed} by you.
You can also increase the order by 2 to target creatures other than Humanoids with this power.

spell.name: Mass Choke
entries: You attempt to lock your enemies in a telekinetic grip. Each creature of your choice within range must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or become {@condition restrained} for the duration. At the start of each of their turns, a {@condition restrained} creature takes {@damage 5d8} force damage. A {@condition restrained} creature can use an action to make a Strength ({@skill Athletics}) or Dexterity ({@skill Acrobatics}) check against your power save
DC, ending the condition on themself on a success.

spell.name: Melt
entries: Choose a manufactured, nonsupernatural Small or Tiny metal object, such as a metal weapon or a suit of metal armor, that you can see within range. You cause the object to glow red-hot. If the object isn't carried or worn by another creature, it melts into useless slag.

If the object is carried or worn by another creature, that creature must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes {@damage 5d10} fire damage and the object melts into useless slag. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and the object doesn't melt.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Increased Order
entries: When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 to increase the damage by {@dice 2d10} for each increase of 1.

spell.name: Memory Gap
entries: You attempt to erase another creature's memories. One creature that you can see must make a Wisdom saving throw. If you are fighting the creature, they have advantage on the saving throw.

On a failed save, you can erase the target's memory of an event that they experienced within the last 24 hours and that lasted no more than 10 minutes. You can permanently eliminate all memory of the event. The target can't recall what happened to them during that time, but they are unbothered by the hole in their recollection.

Any creature that can sense psionics, such as one under the influence of the sixth sense power, can tell the target has had their memory modified. The cure ailment power manifested on the target restores the creature's memory.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Increased Order
entries: When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1. If you do, you can implant a false memory in place of the one you removed.
You can also increase the order by 1 or more to increase the duration of the memory you erase by 10 minutes for each increase of 1.
You can also increase the order by 1 to erase the target's memory of an event that took place 7 days ago or by 2 to erase the memory of an event from 30 days ago.

spell.name: Mindscape
entries: You attempt to make a creature you can see within range view the environment as something else. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes the {@action Dash} action on their next turn, moving in a random direction rolled on the Mindscape Directions table.
The target doesn't avoid hazards, but does attempt to move around, over, or under obstacles after touching them. On a successful save, the target takes {@damage 1d6} psychic damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Increased Order
entries: When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 or more. You can target one additional creature for each increase of 1. The creatures must be within 30 feet of each other when you target them. Roll a random direction for each creature that fails the saving throw.

spell.name: Mindwipe
entries: You attempt to wipe the mind of a creature you can see within range. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target's proficiency bonus is +0 (reducing the bonus they receive to ability checks, attack rolls, saving throws they make with proficiency), and the target can't cast spells, manifest powers, understand language, or communicate in any intelligible way for the duration. On a successful save, the target takes {@damage 3d10} psychic damage.

spell.name: Minor Acceleration
entries: You touch a creature and their speed increases by 10 feet until the end of your next turn.

spell.name: Momentary Lapse of Reason
entries: Pick one creature or object you can see within range. Each creature of your choice within 30 feet of the target sees the target as something they greatly desire and must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a creature drops whatever they are holding and uses their reaction, if available, to move their speed toward the target by the most direct route. If the creature gets within 5 feet of the target, they stop moving and fall {@condition prone}. Creatures that can't be {@condition charmed} automatically succeed on their saving throw against this power.

spell.name: Overheat
entries: You attempt to raise the internal temperature of a creature you can see within range. That creature must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failure, the target gains a level of {@condition exhaustion}. On a success, they take {@damage 2d6} fire damage. Creatures that are resistant or immune to fire damage automatically succeed on their saving throw against this effect.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Increased Order
entries: When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 or more.
When you do, you can target one additional creature within range for each increase of 1.

spell.name: Paragon
entries: You touch one creature, and for the duration each of their ability scores is 20, unless the target's score is already higher.

spell.name: Penetrating Sight
entries: You can see into and through solid matter for the duration. This vision has a radius of 30 feet.

To the target, solid objects within that radius appear transparent and don't prevent light from passing through them. The vision can penetrate 1 foot of stone, 1 inch of common metal, or up to 3 feet of wood or dirt. Thicker substances block the vision, as does a thin sheet of lead.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Increased Order
entries: When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 or more. You increase the radius of the vision by 30 feet for each increase of 1.

spell.name: Precognition
entries: You touch a willing creature and gift them limited foresight for danger. For 8 hours, the target can add {@dice 1d6} to their initiative rolls and can't be surprised.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Increased Order
entries: When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 or more. You can target one additional creature for each increase of 1.

spell.name: Psionic Bolt
entries: You shoot a purple beam of psychic force from your forehead at a creature or object. Make a ranged power attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 1d6} force damage, and if the target is Large or smaller, they are pushed 5 feet away from you. This attack's damage increases by {@dice 1d6} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d6}), 11th level ({@dice 3d6}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d6}).

spell.name: Psionic Resilience
entries: You touch a willing creature and give them immunity to one condition of your choice for the duration. If the target suffers from the chosen condition when you manifest this power, that condition is suppressed for the duration.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Increased Order
entries: When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 or more. You can target one additional creature for each increase of 1.

spell.name: Psionic Shift
entries: Choose one creature other than you that you can see within range that isn't {@condition grappled} or {@condition restrained}. The target must succeed on a Strength saving throw or be moved 5 feet in a direction of your choice. The target can choose to fail this saving throw.

spell.name: Psychic Projection
entries: You instantly project your consciousness to a particular location that is on the same plane of existence as you. The destination you choose must be one you at least have a detailed description of.

The material body you leave behind is {@condition unconscious} and in a state of suspended animation; it doesn't need food or air and doesn't age. Your projected consciousness resembles your mortal form and replicates your game statistics, you can't physically affect the world around you, interact with objects or hold, cast spells, or manifest powers, and this form is immune to all damage except for force and psychic damage. Additionally, this form has a flying speed equal to your walking speed and can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain, but you take {@damage 1d10} force damage if you end your turn inside an object. Your consciousness is a separate incarnation from your body. Any damage or other effects that apply to consciousness have no effect on your physical body, nor do they persist when you return to it.
When this power ends, your consciousness returns to your body. If your body is destroyed when this power ends, you die.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Increased Order
entries: You can manifest this power at order 6 to have it affect you and up to eight willing creatures within 10 feet of you. Your consciounesses all travel to the same destination.

spell.name: Psychic Stab
entries: One creature you can see within range must make an Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 1d10} psychic damage.
This attack's damage increases by {@dice 1d10} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d10}), 11th level ({@dice 3d10}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d10}).

spell.name: Pulse
entries: Waves of force emulate from you, hindering the movement of nearby enemies. When you manifest this power, you can designate any number of creatures you can see to be unaffected by it.

Creatures treat the area within 15 feet of you as difficult terrain. When a creature ends their turn within 15 feet of you, you can attempt to trip the creature (no action required). The target must succeed on a Strength saving throw or fall {@condition prone}.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Increased Order
entries: When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 or more to increase the radius affected around you by 5 feet for each increase of 1.

spell.name: Ravages of Time
entries: You attempt to rapidly age the body of one creature you can see within range. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 5d8} necrotic damage and ages {@dice 1d10} years. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and doesn't age.
A target aged by this power reverts to their normal age when they finish a long rest.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Increased Order
entries: When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 to increase the damage by {@dice 2d8} for each increase of 1.

spell.name: Read Object
entries: You touch an object and gain the following information:

items: You get a mental image of the last creature to hold the object.
You learn of any events that have occurred within 20 feet of the object within the last 8 hours. You see and hear the events from the object's perspective.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Increased Order
entries: When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1. When you do this, the duration of the power increases to 24 hours and you can put an {@condition invisible} psionic sensor on the object. For the duration, you can use an action to learn the object's location relative to you (its distance and direction) and to look at the object's surroundings from its point of view as if you were there.

spell.name: Read Thoughts
entries: Choose a creature within range that you can see. If the creature you choose has an Intelligence of 3 or lower or doesn't speak any language, the creature is unaffected.

For the duration, you learn the surface thoughts of the creature—what is most on their mind in that moment. While reading the target's mind, you have advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) and Charisma ({@skill Deception}, {@skill Intimidation}, and {@skill Persuasion}) checks made to influence the target.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Increased Order
entries: When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1. When you do this, you can use a bonus action while the power is active to dig deeper into the target's mind.

When you probe deeper, the target must make an Intelligence saving throw. On a success, the power ends. On a failure, you gain insight into the target's reasoning (if any), their emotional state, and something that looms large in their mind (such as something it worries over, loves, or hates). The target doesn't know that you dug into their mind.

spell.name: Reflection
entries: You create a copy of a creature with a challenge rating or level of 10 or lower that you can see within range. The copy appears within an unoccupied space of your choice that you can see within range and acts on the same initiative count as you immediately after you take your turn.
This copy has the same statistics as the original creature, except that they have nonsupernatural copies of the creature's equipment and no lair, legendary, or villain actions.
The copy can understand and is loyal to you and disappears when they are reduced to 0 hit points.

spell.name: Rejuvenate
entries: You touch one creature and push time through their body, restoring their body to an earlier state. The target gains one of the following benefits:

entries.name: Closed Wounds
entries: The target regains 50 hit points.

entries.name: Fresh Start
entries: Any conditions affecting the target end.

entries.name: Regain Power
entries: Roll {@dice 1d4 + 1}. The target regains one expended spell slot, the level of which equals the result or lower (the target's choice).

spell.name: Reminisce
entries: Choose a creature within range that you can see. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw, and does so with advantage if you or your companions are fighting them. A creature that can't be {@condition charmed} automatically succeeds on the saving throw against this power.

On a failed save, the target believes that a friend or loved one has approached them and wishes to have a pleasant conversation. The target stops whatever they are doing and has a conversation with the imaginary acquaintance for the duration. The target can repeat the saving throw if they take damage or if another creature uses an action to point out that the target isn't having a conversation with a real person, ending the effect on themself on a success.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Increased Order
entries: When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 or more. The duration increases by 1 hour for each increase of 1.

spell.name: Repel
entries: Choose a Medium or smaller creature or object that you can see within range. When you target an object, it must weigh 300 pounds or less and not be carried or worn by another creature, and you can move it up to 30 feet in any direction, including up. When you target a creature, they must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, you can move them up to 30 feet in any direction, including up. On a successful save, you can move the target 5 feet in any direction. A target can choose to fail the saving throw.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Increased Order
entries: When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 or more. You can target one additional creature or object for each increase of 1.

spell.name: Restore the Past
entries: You touch a piece of a Large or smaller nonsupernatural object that has been destroyed and remake it with your mind.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Increased Order
entries: When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 2. If you do, you can remake Huge objects.

spell.name: Restructure
entries: You touch a Large or smaller nonsupernatual object and psionically vibrate it, changing the material it is made out of (e.g. from metal to stone or from wood to glass). You can't change the object's state—it must remain a gas, liquid, or solid—and you can't make the object worth more (e.g. if you turn a silver statue into a gold statue, the gold is of such a poor quality that the statue's worth remains the same).

entriesHigherLevel.name: Increased Order
entries: When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 to change the material of a Huge object.

spell.name: Reveal the Path
entries: Describe or name a creature that is familiar to you that has passed within 1,000 feet of your location on the same plane of existence when you manifest this power in the last 24 hours. You know every location the creature visited on the plane of existence where you manifested this power within the last 24 hours. You know the direction and distance to these locations, but not how to access them.

The power can locate a specific creature known to you, so long as you have seen such a creature up close—within 30 feet—at least once or have seen a detailed image of the creature, such as a professional portrait. If the creature you described or named is in a different form, such as being under the effects of a polymorph spell, this power doesn't locate the creature.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Increased Order
entries: When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 to know every location the creature visited on the plane of existence where you manifested this power within the last 7 days.

spell.name: Rewrite
entries: You bend a small portion of reality and change a Tiny nonsupernatural object in range that isn't carried or worn by another creature into another Tiny nonsupernatural object of the same or lesser value of your choice for the duration.

spell.name: Scorch
entries: A burst of fire forming a line 30 feet long and 5 feet wide blasts out from you in a direction you choose. Each creature in the line must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes {@damage 2d6} fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
The fire ignites flammable objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Increased Order
entries: When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 or more. The damage increases by {@dice 2d6} for each increase of 1.
You can also increase the order by 1 or more to increase the power's area of effect. When you do so, you increase the length of the line by 30 feet for each increase of 1.

spell.name: Shadow Form
entries: You transform your body and any equipment you wear into amorphous shadow and gain the following benefits for the duration:

items: You gain a flying speed of 60 feet.
You are resistant to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonsupernatural attacks.
You have advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks and can attempt to hide without cover.
You can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

entries: While you are in this form, you can't pick up objects or wield your equipment.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Increased Order
entries: When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 to increase the duration to 1 hour.

spell.name: Shared Thoughts
entries: You pick a creature in range and send them a telepathic message of up to twenty-five words or a single visual image (which can include no more than twenty-five words). The target can send a message of up to twenty-five words back to you.

This power allows your telepathic connection to pass through solid objects if you are familiar with the target and know it is beyond the barrier, but 1 foot of stone, 1 inch of common metal, a thin sheet of lead, or 3 feet of wood blocks the power. The power doesn't have to follow a straight line and can travel freely around corners or through openings.

spell.name: Sharpened Senses
entries: You can make a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check with advantage to detect hidden creatures, doors, objects, and traps in your environment.

spell.name: Sixth Sense
entries: You touch a willing creature and give them one of the following senses for the duration:

items: The target gains {@sense darkvision} out to a range of 60 feet.
The target gains {@sense tremorsense|MM} out to a range of 10 feet.

The target can sense the presence of psionics within 30 feet of them. If the target senses psionics in this way, they can use an action to see a faint aura around any visible creature or object within 30 feet of the target that bears psionic power. This sense can penetrate most barriers, but it is blocked by 1 foot of stone, 1 inch of common metal, a thin sheet of lead, or 3 feet of wood or dirt.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Increased Order
entries: When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 or more. You can target one additional creature for each increase of 1. Each target must gain the same sense.
You can also increase the order by 1 or more to increase the range of a sense. The sense's range increases 10 feet for each increase of 1.

spell.name: Smoke Screen
entries: You create a 20-foot-radius sphere of acrid, opaque smoke centered on a point you choose within range. The smoke spreads around corners. It lasts for the duration or until strong wind disperses the smoke, ending the power. Its area is heavily obscured.

When a creature enters the power's area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there, that creature must make a Constitution saving throw. The creature takes {@damage 3d6} fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Creatures are affected even if they hold their breath or don't need to breathe.
As a bonus action, you can move the smoke 10 feet in a direction you choose at the start of each of your turns.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Increased Order
entries: When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 or more. The damage increases by {@dice 2d6} for each increase of 1.

spell.name: Souls Intertwined
entries: You attempt to swap the minds of two creatures you can see within range. Each creature must make a Charisma saving throw. If both creatures fail, their minds are swapped for the duration.

While their minds are swapped, each creature uses the other's Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores, which could impact other statistics like a creature's spell save DCs. If only one creature fails the saving throw, that creature takes {@damage 6d10} psychic damage.
If a creature with a swapped mind dies and their counterpart still lives, the dying creature can make a choice as their soul leaves the body.

items: The soul can move on to the afterlife, permanently sealing the mind of the counterpart creature in the remaining living body. Only a wish spell or similar magic can let a creature permanently sealed inside another's body return to their original form.

The soul can attempt to force their way back into their original body. Both creatures must make an opposed Charisma check. On a success, the soul reclaims their old body and forces the counterpart creature's soul into the afterlife.

spell.name: Stasis Field
entries: You stop time in a sem-itranslucent, 20-foot cube originating from you that lasts for the duration.
Objects in the cube when it appears that aren't worn or carried by a creature can't be moved, damaged, or destroyed.

You and any creatures in the cube when it appears can move through it freely and cast spells and manifest powers through the cube. All other creatures, spells, powers, and supernatural effects are barred from passing through the field.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Increased Order
entries: When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 or more to increase the size of the cube by 10 feet on all sides for every increase of 1.

spell.name: Steel
entries: Your skin turns into a hardened, shiny metal, and you gain the following benefits for the duration:

items: You are resistant to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.
Any critical hit against you becomes a normal hit.
You can take the {@action Attack} action to make three attacks with your limbs. Each is a power attack that deals {@damage 2d10} + your manifestation ability modifier bludgeoning damage on a hit.
At the start of your turn if you have at least 1 hit point remaining, you regain 10 hit points.

spell.name: Sympathy

time.condition: which you take in response to being damaged by a creature within 60 feet that you can see

entries: You psionically reach out toward the creature that harmed you and share your pain. The creature must make a Wisdom saving throw. It takes {@damage 1d12} psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Increased Order
entries: When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 or more. The damage increases by {@dice 1d12} for each increase of 1.

spell.name: Target of Hate
entries: Pick one creature within range. Each creature of your choice within 30 feet of the target sees them as something they despise and must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a creature uses their reaction, if available, to move their speed toward the target by the most direct route. If the creature gets close enough to make a melee attack against the target, they stop moving and make a melee attack against the target. Creatures that can't be {@condition charmed} automatically succeed on their saving throw against this power.

spell.name: Telekinetic Burst
entries: You unleash an explosion of mental force from a point you can see within range. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Dexterity saving throw. A target takes {@damage 5d6} force damage and is pushed 10 feet away from the point on a failed save, or takes half as much damage and isn't pushed on a successful one.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Increased Order
entries: When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 or more. The damage increases by {@dice 2d6} for each increase of 1.

spell.name: The Real
entries: This power gives the willing creature you touch the ability to see things as they actually are. For the duration, the creature has {@sense truesight}, notices secret doors hidden by magic or psionics, and can see into the Ethereal Plane, all out to a range of 120 feet.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Increased Order
entries: When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 to target one additional creature.

spell.name: Time Thief
entries: You psionically absorb the life force of a creature within range, causing them to age faster than normal. The creature must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take {@damage 1d4} necrotic damage and you gain temporary hit points equal to the damage taken. This power's damage increases by {@dice 1d4} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d4}), 11th level ({@dice 3d4}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d4}).

spell.name: Veritas
entries: You target up to three creatures you can see within range. The targets must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, you know when the creature speaks, writes, or otherwise communicates a lie for the duration. You know whether each creature succeeds or fails on their saving throw.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Increased Order
entries: When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 or more. You can target one additional creature for each increase of 1. The creatures must be within 60 feet of each other when you target them.

spell.name: Weight
entries: You choose a creature within range and change their weight. The target must succeed on a Constitution saving throw, or suffer one of the following effects of your choice:

entries.name: Gravitas
entries: The target's speed is reduced by 20 feet.

entries.name: Levitas
entries: At the start of each of their turns, the target rises vertically 5 feet. When the effect ends, the target falls to the ground. A creature can choose to fail their saving throw against this effect. Creatures with a flying speed automatically succeed on their saves against this effect, unless they choose to fail.
The effect lasts for the duration. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of their turns, ending the effect on themself on a success.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Increased Order
entries: When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 or more. You can target one additional creature for each increase of 1. You must choose the same effect for all targets.
You can increase the order by 1 or more. When you do, the speed reduction of Gravitas or the rate of vertical rise for Levitas increases by 5 feet for each increase of 1.

spell.name: Witness Demise
entries: You project a mental image into the minds of up to three creatures you can see within range.
Choose one of the following options, which affects all targets:

entries.name: Future Demise
entries: You show each target a possible death they will experience that is far in the future and peaceful or heroic. For the duration, each target can't be {@condition frightened} and makes all saving throws with advantage.

entries.name: Imminent Demise
entries: You show each target a possible death that they will experience imminently and that is violent or terrible. Each target must make a Wisdom saving throw, taking {@damage 8d8} psychic damage and becoming {@condition frightened} of you for the duration on a failed save, or half as much damage without becoming {@condition frightened} on a successful one.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Increased Order
entries: When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 to target one additional creature.
You can also increase the order by 1 to increase the psychic damage of the Imminent Demise option by {@dice 2d8}.
